sentences.english: The wandering tour saddens the days with sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 无奈流浪的旅程，让悲伤增添愁苦哀戚的伤痕。

sentences.english: I am afraid of all my sorrows, I know that thou wilt not hold me innocent.
sentences.chinese: 我因愁苦而惧怕，知道你必不以我为无辜。

sentences.english: Even if the waters of the Spring River were all tears, The flow of sadness would never end in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 即使江水都化作泪水，也流不尽，依然有愁苦在心头。

sentences.english: As God liveth, who hath taken away my judgment;
sentences.chinese: 神夺去我的理，全能者使我心中愁苦。

sentences.english: To have a fool for a son brings grief; there is no joy for the father of a fool.
sentences.chinese: 生愚昧子的，必自愁苦，愚顽人的父毫无喜乐。

sentences.english: She was deeply distressed and prayed to the LORD and wept bitterly.
sentences.chinese: 哈拿心里愁苦，就痛痛哭泣，祈祷耶和华。

sentences.english: The first thing that Cosette felt was a confused and profound melancholy.
sentences.chinese: 珂赛特的最初感受是一种慌乱而沉重的愁苦。

sentences.english: Wordless silently, his face full of sadness color.
sentences.chinese: 默默无语，脸上尽是愁苦之色。

sentences.english: 4The sorrows of those will increase who run after other gods.
sentences.chinese: 以别神代替耶和华的，他们的愁苦必加增。

sentences.english: Throughthe sadness of all things I hear the crooning of theEternalMother.
sentences.chinese: 从万物的愁苦中，我听见了“永恒母亲”的呻吟。

sentences.english: How long shall I take counsel in my soul, having sorrow in my heart daily?
sentences.chinese: 我心里筹算，终日愁苦，要到几时呢。

sentences.english: Stroeve gave me a look with his woeful eyes.
sentences.chinese: 施特略夫用他那对愁苦的眼睛瞪了我一眼。

sentences.english: Then their numbers decreased, and they were humbled by oppression, calamity and sorrow;
sentences.chinese: 他们又因暴虐，患难，愁苦，就减少且卑下。

sentences.english: She is in bitter distress, but the Lord has hidden it from me and has not told me why.
sentences.chinese: 因为她心里愁苦，耶和华向我隐瞒，没有指示我。
